import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')
source.4f61d879:
df['Accomplished 2021'] = df['Accomplished 2021'].fillna(0)
df['Accomplished 2021'] = df['Accomplished 2021'].map({0:"Can't Say",1:'May Not be',2:'May be',3:'Will Try',4:'Hopefully',5:'Definitely'})
df['Expecting to accomplish 2022'] = df['Expecting to accomplish 2022'].fillna(0)
df['Expecting to accomplish 2022'] = df['Expecting to accomplish 2022'].map({0:"Can't Say",1:'May Not be',2:'May be',3:'Will Try',4:'Hopefully',5:'Definitely'})
source.9a17ccc3:
state = df.groupby(df.State).size()
explode = (0.1,0.1)*7
color = sns.color_palette('colorblind')
#Ploting pie plot
plt.figure(figsize = (8,8))
plt.title("State-wise Respondents")
plt.pie(x = state, labels = state.index, normalize=True, data = df, autopct="%1.1f%%", explode=explode, colors=color)
plt.show()
source.c382fbf7:
plt.figure(figsize = (10,10))
plt.title("Gender Wise Response")
plt.pie(x=df.Gender.value_counts(), labels = df.Gender.value_counts().index, normalize=True,autopct="%1.1f%%")
plt.show()
source.f5d69c1e:
fig,ax = plt.subplots(1,2)

# For 2021
table = pd.pivot_table(df,index=['Generation'],aggfunc={'Had 2021':'count'}, columns='Had 2021')
table.plot(kind='bar',figsize = (20,10),ax=ax[0])
plt.legend(loc = 'upper right')
ax[0].set(title ='Respondent had taken Resolution in 2021-- Generation wise')

# For 2022
table1 = pd.pivot_table(df,index=['Generation'],aggfunc={'Have 2022':'count'}, columns='Have 2022')
table1.plot(kind='bar',figsize = (20,10), ax=ax[1])
plt.legend(loc = 'upper right')
ax[1].set(title = 'Respondent have taken Resolution in 2022-- Generation wise')
plt.show()
source.6cc47b17:
plt.figure(figsize = (15,10))
#For 2021
plt.subplot(1,2,1)
sns.histplot(df['2021 category'],color='magenta')
plt.title("Category Under which Respondents belong for 2021")


#For 2022
plt.subplot(1,2,2)
sns.histplot(df['2022 category'],color='navy', kde=True)
plt.title("Category Under which Respondents belong for 2022")

plt.show()
source.658840a7:
acc = pd.pivot_table(df, index = ['Generation'], aggfunc={'Accomplished 2021':'count'}, columns = 'Accomplished 2021')
ex_acc = pd.pivot_table(df, index = ['Generation'], aggfunc={'Expecting to accomplish 2022':'count'}, columns = 'Expecting to accomplish 2022')

fig, axs = plt.subplots(1,2)
#For 2021
axs[0].set(title ='Accomplishment of the Respondents for 2021')
acc.plot(kind='bar',figsize = (20,10), ax =axs[0])
plt.legend(loc = 'upper right')


#For 2022
ex_acc.plot(kind='bar',figsize = (20,10), ax =axs[1])
plt.legend(loc = 'upper left')
axs[1].set(title ='Expected to Accomplish Resolution for 2022')

plt.show()

sns.histplot(df['Expecting to fail 2022'],color='Blue')
plt.title("Expecting to fail 2022")
plt.show()
